nDescription: Facing : North <nline> You face the north side of the hallway and inspect the wood paneled walls. Yep, that’s a wall alright.
eDescription: Facing : East <nline> You open the door that leads further east, and walk a slow sloping hallway that dead ends at the top of a ladder (east). You cannot see what awaits you at the bottom of the ladder.
sDescription: Facing : South <nline> Looking at the South wall of this hallway doesn't tell you much. Seems to be wood paneling? It's kind of tacky if you think about it.
wDescription: Facing : West <nline> A long uphill corrider leads back into the small study.
